title: Define 'revenue' as net revenue excluding refunds
rationale: The finance team needs a consistent definition of 'revenue' across all dashboards and reports. After analysis, net revenue (gross revenue minus refunds and chargebacks) best represents actual business performance and aligns with GAAP reporting requirements.

options_considered.title: Net revenue — gross revenue minus refunds and chargebacks
Gross revenue — total invoiced amount before any deductions
options_considered.rejected_reason: Overstates actual business performance; does not account for refunds.
